title: The Adventures of Tintin: The Secret of the Unicorn
description: The Adventures of Tintin chronicles the exploits of the intrepid young reporter Tintin, whose relentless pursuit of a good story thrusts him into a world of high adventure. Along with his faithful canine sidekick Snowy, and the blustery sea dog Captain Haddock, Tintin travels the globe, averting danger at every turn to discover the secret of the fabled ship The Unicorn.
author: Alexander C. Irvine
